question: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.A restaurant has placed an advertisement for waiters and waitresses in your local newspaper.Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:explain what you are currently doingdescribe your suitability for this area of worksay when you can attend an interviewYou should write at least 150 words.
text: Recently, I have seen a job advertisement in Dawn news regarding waiter position in your restaurant and I am writing to apply for this job. Allow me to elobrate further.

I have finished my bachelors in tourism very recently and along with this I have also completed a part time internship of 1 year as a tourist assistant a month ago. I have been looking for a full time work which involves direct dealing with the customers or guests, therefore, I am highly interested for this opportunity.

Due to my education and experience, my expertise lies in interaction with customers, guests, and visitors, where I can conveniently interact with different types of customers and ensuring they are completely satisfied with my service. As such I am highly suitable with this available job position.

Currently, I am in my hometown and plan to return in 3 days time period on 18th August 2020. As interview requirement is mandatory for this position, I can not attend it immediately due to my current ongoing vacation, kindly advise if the interview can be conducted over phone? If yes, then I am available anytime, and If not then I can only attend interview from 19th August 2020 onwards.
I look forward to hearing back from you.
